about_the_game:
Warrior Souls is a multiplayer and singelplayer medieval-fantasy game. Play with your friends or fight with other players in brutal battles. You can choose different Warriors from knights to samurais or Vikings. You will experience 1vs1, a great story, castle fights, and more.

Features:

  • Intense 1vs1 fights: Fight in an Epic 1vs1 battle in an epic landscape.
  • Online & offline play: Play online against to Online players or fight offline versus AI
  • Campaign: A good and brutal campaign awaits you
  • Character customization: choose your skin, choose your weapon, and pick out individual pieces of armor to create the perfect warrior.
  • Choosable Fatalities: choose for every warrior different fatalities to take out your enemies in a cool way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1500X or simlar Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 680 or simlar AMD GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For Multiplayer good internet connection and small latency to player is needed (<25ms).
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3500X or simlar Intel CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or simlar AMD GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For Multiplayer good internet connection and small latency to player is needed (<25ms).
